name: Runic Fang
description: A "fang" with which the mysterious, snakelike machine of old dug intomountains' depths. There are many ominous runes carved on it.  It is said that giant serpents lurk in the dark fissures deep beneath theground. Burning with eternal resentment and malice toward the world above,they throw themselves into digging great tunnels, yet none know what theirmalicious purposes are...
